WebMessage.name: kmsgDashboardPrepareGuided
WebMessage.HTML: بررسی شرایط

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortal1SharedCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains 1 shared shortcutto this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortal1User1SharedCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains 1 user shortcutand 1 shared shortcutto this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortal1UserCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains 1 user shortcutto this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortal1UserNSharedCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains 1 user shortcutand shared shortcuts to this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAboveOptionsShowRequestAsLink
WebMessage.TEXT: Above options show the name of the request as a link - clicking on the link will execute the request

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAddAudioInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This screen allows you to add audio to the selected section of the Dashboard. The audio will play whenever the page containing this section is selected.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAddHTMLHelp
WebMessage.TEXT:
You can include HTML tags in the text such as ,
, ,

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAddHTMLInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This screen allows you to add any HTML to a section of the Dashboard. This allows for full HTML formatting of text, as well as embedding and scripting of objects.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAddIFrameInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This screen allows you to add another site or document to the selected section of the Dashboard. The specified URL will appear directly in the current section of the Dashboard with the given width and height.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAddImageInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This screen allows you to add an image to the selected section of the Dashboard. You can optionally link the image to other internal or external content.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAddLinkInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This screen allows you to add a link and/or descriptive text to the selected section of the Dashboard. A link can be specified as any URL that the browser can interpret. To just add descriptive text to the section, don't specify a URL.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAsLinkDisplaysResultsSeparateWindow
WebMessage.TEXT: As a Link that displays the results in a separate window

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalAsLinkDisplaysResultsWithinPortal
WebMessage.TEXT: As a Link that displays the results within the Dashboard

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalBrowserCannotDisplayEmbedded
WebMessage.TEXT: مرورگر شما نمی تواند محتوای تعبیه شده را نشان دهد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalCanChooseSpecificViewOrDefault
WebMessage.TEXT: You can choose to display a specific result view or the default compound view.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalChooseRequest
WebMessage.HTML: Choose a request or other item from the catalog to insert into the current section of the Dashboard. Clicking on folders will navigate through the catalog. Clicking on an item will add a shortcut to it to the current section.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalColumnMissing
WebMessage.TEXT: ستون داشبورد در کاتالوگ یافت نشد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalConfirmItemDelete2
WebMessage.TEXT: You are about to delete an item that is not a shortcut from the catalog.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalConfirmLinkedItemDelete
WebMessage.TEXT: You are about to delete an item that is a shortcut from the catalog.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalConfirmSectionItemReplace
WebMessage.HTML: An item with the given name already exists in the selected Section. Do you wish to replace it?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalConfirmSectionReplace
WebMessage.HTML: A section with the given name already exists in the selected column. Do you wish to replace it?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalCreatePortalInfo
WebMessage.HTML: When creating an Interactive Dashboard, you specify a shared folder and a Dashboard name. Users with read permission to the specified folder will be able to view the Dashboard. You can change who can view and modify the Dashboard by choosing Permissionsfrom the Manage Dashboards screen.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalDefaultDashboard
WebMessage.HTML: Name this Dashboard ''to copy its pages to the personal Dashboards of new users in this group. Pages will be copied at first login.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalDownloadData
WebMessage.HTML: دانلود داده

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEditColumnInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This page allows you to change the way a column appears in the Dashboard. You can reorder and rename the sections within this column, as well as specify the types of devices that have access to each section.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEditSectionAddItems
WebMessage.TEXT: You can add, edit, rename, or delete items in the section as well as change their display order. To add a new item, click one of the Add options below.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEditSectionInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This page allows you to add content to a section, as well as control access to the types of devices this section is enabled for.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEmbeddedContent
WebMessage.HTML: تعبیه محتوا

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEnterCaptionForImage
WebMessage.TEXT: برای تصویر یک عنوان وارد کنید

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEnterLocationAndNameForPortalAndModifyUserGroup
WebMessage.TEXT: محل و نام داشبورد را وارد کنید، به عنوان یک کاربر یا گروه که می تواند داشبورد را تغییر دهد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEnterNameForHTMLItem
WebMessage.TEXT: نام این آیتم HTML وارد کنید.این نام در کاتالوگ ظاهر خواهد شد، نه در داشبورد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalEnterNameForNewPage
WebMessage.HTML: نام صفحه جدید را وارد کنید. نام در تب ها صفحه داشبورد ظاهر می شود.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalExistingRequest
WebMessage.HTML: درخواست های موجود

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalGeneralPropertiesInfo
WebMessage.HTML: در زیرتغییرات را ایجاد و سپس کلیک کنید برای بروز رسانی داشبورد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalGoErrorAccessingDatabase
WebMessage.TEXT: خطا در دسترسی به پایگاه داده

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalGoUnknownExceptionAccessingDatabase
WebMessage.TEXT: استثنا ناشناخته دسترسی به پایگاه داده رخ داده است

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVAllPageAccessDenied
WebMessage.TEXT: You do not have permission to any of the pages on this Dashboard.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVColumnLinksDelete
WebMessage.HTML: بخش جديد | افزودن پوشه | حذف ستون

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVColumnLinksEdit
WebMessage.HTML: بخش جديد | افزودن پوشه | ویرایش ستون

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVInvisiblePortal
WebMessage.TEXT: داشبورد درخواست شده برای این دستگاه مخفی می باشد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVInvisiblePortalChange
WebMessage.HTML: The requested dashboard has been hidden for this device. To see the dashboard, click hereto go to the Dashboard Propertiespage, click the Desktop Browser (PC)icon and then click to return.

tr.td:
این داشبورد خالی است.
کلیک کنید اینجا برای اطلاعات بیشتر.

This dashboard is empty.
Dashboards are made up of sections of information which can contain items such as analytic results, external Web content, HTML text, graphics, links to other sites, embedded objects and so on. These sections are organized into columns and pages. In order to add content to the portal, you must first create a new dashboard page.
After creating the page, you will be able to easily add columns, sections and content to the dashboard. Click herefor additional information.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVPortalPageEmpty
WebMessage.HTML:
این صفحه داشبورد خالی است.
کلیک کنیداینجا برای اطلاعات بیشتر.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalHPVPortalPageEmptyAddColumn
WebMessage.HTML:
این صفحه داشبورد خالی است.
آیا تمایل دارید که اضافه کردن یک ستون به این صفحه یا حذف صفحه از این داشبوردکلیک کنید اینجا برای اطلاعات بیشتر.

WebMessage.TEXT: If you have proper authority, this screen allows you to create and delete Interactive Dashboards, as well as control which users can access them.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalModifyRequest
WebMessage.HTML: ویرایش آنالیز

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNSharedCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains shared shortcuts to this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains user shortcuts and 1 shared shortcutto this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNUserCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains user shortcuts to this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNUserNSharedCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. The catalog contains user shortcuts and shared shortcuts to this item that will no longer be valid. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNewRequest
WebMessage.HTML: درخواست جدید

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNewSectionAccessDenied
WebMessage.TEXT: شما اجازه دسترسی به ایجاد یک بخش در این مکان ندارد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNewSectionInfo
WebMessage.HTML: Specify a name for the new section and click Create Sectionto create it. This will create a section that is stored directly within the dashboard, to create a reusable section, choose the Add Folderlink.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoAccessToPortalsLogOffAndLogonAgain
WebMessage.HTML:
You do not currently have access to any Dashboards.
You can either log offand log on as a different user, or contact this site's administrator.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoAccessToSharedPortals
WebMessage.TEXT: You don't currently have access to any shared Dashboards.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoCutDelete
WebMessage.HTML: Deleting this item from the section will also remove it from the catalog. There are no shortcuts to this item. Are you sure you want to continue?

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoItemsInSection
WebMessage.TEXT: در حال حاضر هیچ آیتمی در این بخش وجود دارد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoPagesInPortal
WebMessage.TEXT: در حال حاضر صفحه ای در این داشبورد وجود ندارد.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoSectionsInColumn
WebMessage.TEXT: در حال حاضر بخش در این ستون وجود دارد.

WebMessage.HTML:
You are not currently authorized to use .
If you would like to use this powerful capability, please contact this site's administrator.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalNoteRenameDelEtcNotCancel
WebMessage.TEXT: Except for Hide and Reorder, clicking Cancel will not undo operations in this section.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalOptionShowsResultsWithinPortalSection
WebMessage.TEXT: This option shows the results directly within this section of the Dashboard.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalPortalPropertiesInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: Set properties for the Dashboard. Delete, rename, and reorder Dashboard pages.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalPrefixImageURLWithHTTP
WebMessage.TEXT: Unless the image exists on your web server you should prefix the image with 'http://'

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalPrefixURLWithHTTP
WebMessage.TEXT: Unless the destination exists on your web server you should prefix the URL with 'http://'

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalPreviewConfirm
WebMessage.HTML: This is a preview of what the content will look and act like in the dashboard. If you chose to link the item to a URL, you can click on the item to see if it works as expected. If the content is correct, press the Acceptbutton. If not, click on the link below to make changes.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalRefreshResults
WebMessage.HTML: بارگذاری مجدد نتایج

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalRequestPropertiesInfo
WebMessage.TEXT: This page allows you to control how the request is accessed or displayed from the Dashboard.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalSectionAlreadyExists
WebMessage.TEXT: بخش در حال حاضر وجود دارد

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalSectionExistsInColumn
WebMessage.TEXT: An item with the given name already exists in the selected column.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalSharedSectionInfo
WebMessage.HTML: A Dashboard Section can be a viewof a folder that exists in the Catalog. The Section name will be the same as the folder name in the catalog. Select a folder from the catalog below, or choose Create New Folderto create a new empty folder for the section.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalShortcutNiceNames
WebMessage.HTML: ازیک میانبر به آیتم استفاده کنید

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalShowPromptApplyButtons
WebMessage.TEXT: تمام دکمه ها نمایش داده شود

WebMessage.TEXT: تمام دکمه ها تنظیم مجدد نمایش داده شود

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalSpecifyUserGroupCanChangePortal
WebMessage.TEXT: Specify which user or group can make changes to this Dashboard.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalUnableToAccessFolder
WebMessage.HTML: - دسترسی به پوشه امکانپذیر نیست.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalWhatDoYouWantToEmbed
WebMessage.TEXT: What site or document do you want to embed in the Dashboard? The location you specify below will be displayed directly in the Dashboard. You can also specify the size of the frame containing the content.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalWhatLinksShownWithResults
WebMessage.TEXT: چه لینک های باید با نتایج نشان داده شود؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalWhatShouldHappenWhenUserClicksOnItem
WebMessage.TEXT: What should happen when a user clicks on this item? If you specify a URL below, it will be loaded when the user clicks on this item. Leave this field empty if you don't want to link this item to a URL.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPortalXMLUnknownError
WebMessage.TEXT: خطای ناشناخته در زمان تولید XML داشبورد.

WebMessage.TEXT: There was an error while parsing the saved selections XML from ADF.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishDialogMessage
WebMessage.HTML: Choose the dashboard where the current page will be published.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishDialogTitle
WebMessage.HTML: انتخاب داشبورد

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishDirtyUnsavedContent
WebMessage.TEXT: There are private reports and unsaved contents on the dashboard page, do you still want to publish the page?

WebMessage.HTML: برای جایگزینی این آیتم ها برروی دکمه موافق کلیک کنید

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishOverwriteMessagePreviousPart
WebMessage.HTML: آیتم های زیر در حال حاضر در پوشه مقصد وجود دارد:

WebMessage.HTML: Cannot publish page to its existing location.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishPageFailedMessage
WebMessage.HTML: Please choose a different dashboard to publish to.

WebMessage.HTML: Publishing page to dashboard failed.

WebMessage.HTML: خطا رخ داده است.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishPageSucceed
WebMessage.HTML: Published page to dashboard successfully.

WebMessage.name: kmsgPublishUnsavedContent
WebMessage.TEXT: There are unsaved contents on the dashboard page, do you still want to publish the page?

WebMessage.HTML: Please choose a dashboard to publish your page.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSavedSelectionAddPermission
WebMessage.TEXT: Allow specified group(s) to use this Saved Customization

WebMessage.name: kmsgSavedSelectionGroupsWithPermission
WebMessage.HTML: گروه ها با مجوزها

WebMessage.TEXT: سایر مجوز های ذخیره شده و پیش فرض

WebMessage.name: kmsgSavedSelectionPermissionsHelpText
WebMessage.TEXT: Move a group to the "Groups with Permission" area to allow members to use this Saved Customization. Check the box next to a group to make this Saved Customization its default.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSavedSelectionRemovePermission
